title: SoundExchange Statement on Pandora Settlement with Major Record Companies (SoundExchange)
text: ( Source : SoundExchange) October 22 , 2015 SoundExchange President and CEO Michael Huppe issued the following statement on Pandora 's $90 million settlement with the major record companies: 'We are pleased that Pandora has agreed to pay these
